example[0]: Make sure all the windows are closed.
example[1]: She kept her eyes tightly closed.
definition[1]: if a shop, public building etc is closed, it is not open and people cannot enter or use it
example[2]: The shops here are closed on Sundays.
example[3]: The castle is closed to visitors in winter.
definition[2]: restricted to a particular group of people
example[4]: The golf club has closed membership.
example[6]: The police have a closed circle of suspects.
definition[3]: not willing to accept new ideas or influences

example[8]: Venetian art in this period was a closed world.
example[9]: The markets were closed on Monday and Tuesday for the Christmas holiday.
